about_the_game:
Relictor

Relictor is a strategy game with elements of survival and exploration set in a post-apocalyptic world. Manage a mobile base that moves across dangerous terrains, create and control high-tech modules, explore the devastated world, and defend yourself against numerous threats.

Game Overview:

In Relictor, you will control a shuttle whose engines have failed, causing it to move slowly across the ravaged land. Onboard the base is a replicator that creates "external modules"—small machines with artificial intelligence capable of performing various tasks. These modules can be tanks, robots, wheeled vehicles, and gliders that engage in combat, gather resources, and explore anomalies.

Game Features:

  • Time Control in Tactical Battles: Stop time and use strategy to plan attacks and maneuvers.

  • AI Modules: Give your modules autonomy or control them manually. Develop them by upgrading their weapons and equipment.

  • Research and Resource Gathering: Discover new territories, find resources, and locate anomalies that will help you survive and develop your base.

  • Diplomacy and Trade: Encounter various beings, fight, or strike deals to gain advantages.

  • Modifications and Upgrades: Enhance your modules, unlock new capabilities, and acquire new gear.

Relictor is a game where you will need to survive, explore, and build your future in a devastated world filled with dangers and mysteries.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and the destruction of various enemies, including zombies, meta-humans, and humanoid creatures. While there are no graphic depictions of blood or torture, defeated enemies immediately collapse into a darkened form, from which resources can be harvested, similar to mechanics in other grind-focused games. There is no death animation or explicit portrayal of suffering. The game also features infected fauna, including arachnid-like creatures. Additionally, there are no sexual themes, nudity, or sexual content, though some enemies, such as zombies, may be depicted without clothing.

name: Relictor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400 (4 core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Relictor is a strategy game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Manage a mobile base. Create AI-driven modules like tanks and gliders for exploration, resource gathering, and tactical battles. Survive, trade, and uncover mysteries in a dangerous world.
